verses.kjv: O Praise the LORD, all ye nations: praise him, all ye people.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, every nation! Celebrate him, all you peoples of the earth!

verses.kjv: For his merciful kindness is great toward us: and the truth of the LORD endureth for ever. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: His faithful love for us is overwhelming, and the LORD's trustworthiness lasts forever. Praise the LORD!
